articles.title: Bill Clinton: We are both deeply and yet closely divided as a country
articles.description: Joe Scarborough sits down with former President Bill Clinton to discuss his book 'Citizen,' Donald Trump's 2024 election win and the polarized state of U.S. politics.

articles.author: CHRIS MEGERIAN
articles.title: In promising to shake up Washington, Trump is in a class of his own

articles.author: Ben Burgis
articles.title: Obama's democracy forum speech proved his era in politics his over
articles.description: We urgently need a better response to the current crisis than what anyone in the dominant faction of the Democratic Party is delivering, including Barack Obama.
articles.content:
Former President Barack Obama delivered the keynote address at the 2024 Obama Democracy Forum on Thursday night in Chicago. This years theme was pluralism.
